Third-Party Notices for Mozc

This file is intended to contain attributions and license notices for
third-party components included in Mozc. Please replace this placeholder
with the official Mozc NOTICE / third_party license list from the Mozc
repository appropriate to the version you are using.

At minimum, ensure that any third-party libraries, data, or resources
distributed as part of Mozc are properly attributed here with their
respective licenses and copyright.

Note: This placeholder is provided to help integrate license display into
the application. For production distribution, you must insert the official
Mozc third-party notices.
